text: Rowing is a form of propulsion of boats and other watercraft. Rowing may refer to: ==Boats== * Rowing (sport), competitive rowing ** Coastal and ocean rowing, rowing performed on the sea ** Ocean rowing, the sport of rowing across oceans ==Exercise== * Indoor rowing, rowing machine based exercise similar to rowing boats * Rowing exercise, resistance training exercise ==Other== * Shouting match, or rowing, an argument * A track on Soundgarden's 2012 studio album King Animal ==See also== * Roing * Watercraft paddling * * Disam
title: Rowing (disambiguation)
